mapper.update:
UPDATE af_asset_package
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_name = #{assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_no = #{assetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_side_id = #{assetSideId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
valid_status = #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_total_money = #{realTotalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
min_money = #{minMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
min_num = #{minNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_money = #{maxMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
max_num = #{maxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
borrow_rate = #{borrowRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
annual_rate = #{annualRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repayment_method = #{repaymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
send_mode = #{sendMode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
download_url = #{downloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE is_delete = 0 AND id = #{rid ,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE af_asset_package set gmt_modified = now(), real_total_money = real_total_money + #{realTotalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE is_delete = 0 and id = #{rid ,jdbcType=BIGINT} and real_total_money + #{realTotalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} >=0
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM af_asset_package WHERE is_delete = 0 AND id=#{rid ,jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(real_total_money),0) FROM af_asset_package WHERE gmt_create >= CURRENT_DATE() AND asset_side_id = #{assetSideId ,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete=0 and valid_status='Y' and busi_type=1

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(real_total_money),0) FROM af_asset_package WHERE gmt_create >= CURRENT_DATE() AND asset_side_id = #{assetSideId ,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete=0 and valid_status='Y' and busi_type=0
